DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the UroLift System Treatment to Transurethral Resection of the Prostate (TURP) in improving a patient's overall quality of life, while evaluating healthcare expenditures associated with each therapy.
DOC.brief_title: BPH-6: Comparison of the UroLift System to TURP for Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.criteria: â€¢ Men >50 years old with moderatesevere BPH Size, width of prostate Other medical condition or comorbidity contraindicative for TURP or UroLift
